description.brief: ROS wrapper for the Apriltags visual fiducial tracker.

package.description: ROS wrapper for the Swatbotics C++ port of the Apriltags visual fiducial tracker. Apriltags was originally developed by the April laboratory at the University of Michigan. The Swatbotics port reimplements the detection core using OpenCV and CGAL for improved performance.
package.author: Aaron Walsman, Pras Velagapudi
